agents.impl.sockets

Class SocketConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • agents.impl.sockets.SocketConnection

  • public class SocketConnection
extends java.lang.Object
    A connection to the SocketServer which contains the identifiable information for the socket and the underlying connection itself.
    See Also:
    SocketServer

    • Method Detail

      • getConnection

        public java.net.Socket getConnection()
        Returns the socket object from the connection object.
        Returns:
        The underlying socket for this connection.

      • getClientName

        public java.lang.String getClientName()
        Gets the client name from this client.
        Returns:
        The client name.

      • setClientName

        public void setClientName(java.lang.String clientName)
        Sets the client's name. This is updated during identification within SocketServer.identify(agents.impl.sockets.SocketConnection, java.lang.String). Ideally this is only ran ONCE when the connection has been set up.
        Parameters:
        clientName - The new client name for this connection.

      • hashCode

        public int hashCode()
        Calculates the hashCode for this object. Only the connection itself is used to calculate the hashCode.
        Overrides:
        hashCode in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        The objects hashCode.

      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object obj)
        Checks the equality of two SocketConnections.
        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object
        Parameters:
        obj - The other connection to check equality of.
        Returns:
        True if the Connections are equal; false otherwise.
